title: The Corrupted Spring
goal: Investigate a specific, localized source of corruption, forcing Eldrin to push his magical limits and revealing more about the blight's nature.
stakes_shift: Direct confrontation with a potent manifestation of the blight forces Eldrin to push his magical limits, risking his fragile recovery and revealing the blight's destructive capabilities.

bridge.from_prev: The group has a shared understanding of the blight's pervasive nature.
bridge.to_next: The journey continues towards a frontier town, where the blight's social impact becomes evident.

sections.title: A Poisoned Wellspring
sections.intent: Locate a prominent source of the blight's corruption in the environment.

scenes.summary: Following Kael's lead, they discover a once-pure spring now bubbling with dark, viscous ichor, its surrounding flora withered.
scenes.outcome: The group locates a significant, localized source of the Shadow Blight's corruption.

sections.title: Confronting the Taint
sections.intent: Eldrin attempts to cleanse the source, showcasing his growing but still limited power.

scenes.summary: Eldrin channels ancient energies, attempting to purify the corrupted spring, the effort draining him but achieving a partial, temporary cleansing.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin successfully, though partially, purifies the blighted spring, demonstrating a significant return of his magic.

sections.title: The Blight's Resilience
sections.intent: Show that the blight is not easily defeated, even by Eldrin's magic.

scenes.summary: Despite Eldrin's efforts, a faint residue of corruption lingers, hinting at the blight's deep-rooted and resilient nature.
scenes.outcome: The blight proves resilient, suggesting that its source is deeper than a single spring and requires more than simple cleansing.

sections.title: A Shared Burden
sections.intent: The group solidifies their bond through shared peril and purpose.

scenes.summary: Exhausted but united, the trio acknowledges the formidable nature of their foe, their individual motivations aligning into a common purpose.
scenes.outcome: The shared experience solidifies the group's bond and their commitment to fighting the blight.
